author: ADITYA
text: Life doesn't come with a rewind button. Enjoy the moment while it's still here.

author: ADITYA
text: We move closer to what we love when we walk away from what we don't.

author: ADITYA
text: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start  over.

author: ADITYA
text: A positive attitude is a magnet for positive results.

author: ADITYA
text: Heal the past, live the present, dream the future.

author: ADITYA
text:
Life is too short to live the same day twice. So each new day make sure you live your life.
-Machine Gun Kelly

author: ADITYA
text: Take it easy.

author: ADITYA
text:
Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
-Saint Francis de Sales

author: ADITYA
text: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

author: ADITYA
text:
In order to move on, you must understand why you felt what you did and why you no longer need to feel it.
-Mitch Albom

author: ADITYA
text: You don't get results by focusing on results. You get results by focusing on the actions that produce results.

author: ADITYA
text:
To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.
-John Lennon

author: ADITYA
text: Don't sacrifice yourself for the wants of others, neither your body, your soul or your spirit.

author: ADITYA
text:
The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
-Stephen Covey

author: ADITYA
text: Being different isn't a bad thing. It means you're brave enough to be yourself.

author: ADITYA
text: Learn to close your eyes and trust. Learn to open your heart and love. Learn to take the risk and fly.

author: ADITYA
text: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.

author: ADITYA
text: If you're afraid to do something in a social setting, it is because you are more invested in someone else's opinion of you than you are in your own opinion of yourself.

author: ADITYA
text: Change might not be fast and it isn't always easy. But with time and effort, almost any habit can be reshaped.

author: ADITYA
text: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that - thoughts.

author: ADITYA
text: Hope is the only thing stronger than fear.

author: ADITYA
text: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.

author: ADITYA
text: Some things break your heart but fix your vision.

author: ADITYA
text: It is not external events themselves that cause us distress, but the way in which we think about them... It is our attitudes and reactions that give us trouble. We cannot choose our external circumstances, but we can always choose how we respond to them.

author: ADITYA
text: Truth is, I'm generally happiest when it's just me. It's okay to be madly in love with yourself.

author: ADITYA
text: It's not that the world doesn't have positivity. It's just that negativity makes more noise.

author: ADITYA
text: Making excuses burns zero calories per hour.

author: ADITYA
text: Go after dreams, not people.

author: ADITYA
text: Dance. Smile. Giggle. Marvel. Trust. Hope. Love. Wish. Believe. Most of all, enjoy every moment of the journey, and appreciate where you are at this moment instead of always focusing on how far you have to go.

author: ADITYA
text: No one is perfect - that's why pencils have erasers.

author: ADITYA
text: The body achieves what the mind believes.

author: ADITYA
text: If you have the ability to love, love yourself first.

author: ADITYA
text: Give yourself permission to love the life you have today, even if you are planning an even brighter future.

author: ADITYA
text: Never do tomorrow what you can do today. Procrastination is the thief of time.
